alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range; Northwestern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 2:43PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Water Levels Rising Again Later This Week And Weekend... Multiple weather fronts will bring several rounds of rain to the Brooks Range and portions of the North Slope. The most significant rainfall is expected Thursday night through Saturday with 0.5 to 1.5 inches of rain likely west of the Dalton Highway. Rivers draining the Brooks Range will rise again later this week, including the Colville River. Water levels may reach bankfull in some locations with gravel bars being covered, increased debris in the river, and water up to the brush line. People living or recreating along rivers in this area area encouraged to monitor water levels.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Brooks Range; Northwestern Brooks Range
